content: this is the second version of a crochet pattern designed by mtg23 and made freely available through ravelry please contact me through ravelry with any feedback or issues https //www ravelry com/people/mtg23 1 if you like the pattern please consider making a donation to support the charity kingston carers they do an amazing job supporting people who are unpaid carers you can find out more here https //www kingstoncarers org uk/support-us/make-a-donation/ 2 useful videos i have now added to the pdf version two how to do the magic_ring by bella coco https //youtu be/j7ghtfxaz2e feature=shared 3 how to do the x-stitch by abby from ollie + holly i e yarn under instead of yarn over https //youtu be/_iey2_gtshu feature=shared 4 how to decrease invisibly by june gilick of planet june https //youtu be/oubboz1ennk feature=shared 5 1 https //www ravelry com/people/mtg23 2 https //www kingstoncarers org uk/support-us/make-a-donation/ 3 https //youtu be/j7ghtfxaz2e feature=shared 4 https //youtu be/_iey2_gtshu feature=shared 5 https //youtu be/oubboz1ennk feature=shared
